infos.value: Though I believe you have been tackling only the Beginner Missions so far, you can attempt these concurrently with other challenges.
Allow me to introduce you to a different kind of mission.
You can obtain Visiore and various goods by clearing Daily Missions.
Similarly, you can obtain fairly valuable goods by completing Milestones. Be sure to tackle these missions as well.
• Daily Missions •

• Daily Missions •
These missions appear daily, and they are available on the day only.
• Daily Missions II •
By clearing missions every day, you can <color=#00ffff>more or less play all elements of the game</color>.
• Daily Missions III •
Clearing missions will also fill the <color=#00ffff>Progress Gauge</color>...
• Daily Missions IV •
...and once the <color=#00ffff>Gauge</color> fills to a certain level, you can acquire various <color=#00ffff>rewards</color>.
• Milestones •

• Milestones •
Various objectives have been set as missions.
• Milestones II •
Play the game <color=#00ffff>regularly</color> and complete each objective to receive mission <color=#00ffff>rewards</color>.
• Milestones III •
<color=#00ffff>Milestone rewards</color> include <color=#00ffff>Player EXP</color> that will raise your <color=#00ffff>Player Rank</color>.
• Milestones IV •

The higher your <color=#00ffff>Player Rank</color>, the higher your <color=#00ffff>limit</color> on <color=#00ffff>NRG</color> and <color=#00ffff>registered friends</color> will rise, making it easier to play the game.
• Missions •
Proceed to a tutorial on Missions?
Yes
No
